channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: Joe Biden's failure. https://t.co/EEGG5ATDOE
@1000thCassandra do you have a link to the actual tweet?
Why didn't Biden act in advance of the Dobbs decision?

This West Wing scene applies to Biden, who is played by Josh. https://t.co/68CNQuOEwj CJ: You're worried you might drown. CJ: It's the fall that's gonna kill you. Adding more justices won't hurt because the presidency is already dead. It just hasn't hit them yet.
Actually let me correct that.
CJ: The fall has ALREADY killed you.
When the Supreme Courtâ€™s the One Attacking the Constitution, Democracyâ€™s in Deep Trouble. https://t.co/SXMmiQW5Cw
@SolarEcoFund I think you're right about that. The question is are there any good mutual funds for investing in real estate?

@nickearly yes very nice and zen-like, but what if they kill your sister before everything gets all better. or re-enslave people because of the color of their skin. That one took 250 years to unwind. what if they take your life savings. or put everyone of a religion in ovens and burn them.

Thank you @jjn1 for the link to @elienyc, our mentor re what to change in the court now that it has fallen to pieces, and praise for my recent podcast about all this michegas. JN as always, a great read and subscribe. https://t.co/RPplkfMHJV https://t.co/rbRHPPuX9C
@andrewmoti just checking -- you're not trying to answer the question i asked, right?
What's a good investment that tracks inflation?
Welcome to the American Taliban. https://t.co/f8qbv2T7RS
The Norwegian library with unreadable books. https://t.co/xOFnLJaefZ

I want to know what Trump planned to do when he got to the Capitol.
FYI this wasn't intended as a joke. I really would like to know, and I hope some journalists are looking into this.
So far it's weird that the Jan 6 committee is getting all the scoops. Don't any of them have sources?

Will we come to despise Christianity in the US?
I asked this question because up to this last week I felt that Christianity was other peopleâ€™s problem, not mine. But theyâ€™ve captured the Supreme Court, and theyâ€™re using it to force their religion on the rest of us.
So itâ€™s no longer something that I can be neutral about. It seems that eventually, maybe very soon, we will come to hate Christianity.
